name: Zenith Bots
description:
Zenith: The time at which something is most powerful.

Survive as long as possible by avoiding the gray robots.

You can destroy the robots and move faster during your Zenith.

The Zenith is indicated by a blue background and star particles around the player.

(WASD to move)

Created for Zenith, Word of the month on the Umbrella Life/Umbrella Land discord server.
